content.question: Which of the following would be the best control sample for the study?

choices.label: A sample of water collected just downstream of the southern forest
A sample of water collected just downstream of the housing development
A sample of water collected just downstream of the northern forest

content.answer: A sample of water collected just downstream of the northern forest

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Identify a research method, design, and/or measure used.
